entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
